question:
Which of the following statements are correct with respect to the Seismic Waves?
  1. P-waves are body waves and fastest of all kind of seismic waves
  2. S-waves are surface waves and cannot move through any liquid 
  3. Love waves have lower frequency than P-waves
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Second statement is wrong because S-waves are body waves and not surface waves. Love waves are surface waves and surface waves have lower frequency than body waves.
